channel.title: Can someone plz help how o i make donator?
channel.description: SOMEONE PLEASE I WOULD REALLY APPRESCIATE IF YOU COULD HELP ME FIGURE OUT HOW TO PEOPLE DONATOR IN MY 562 SERVER! IF YOU ARE WILLING TO HELP ME...AND IF I GET DONATION I WILL GIVE U 8$ PAYPAL....I HAVE PAYPAL ON MY SERVER WEBSITE FOR PEOPLE TO DONATE I JUST DONT KNOW HOW TO MAKE PEOPLE DONATOR IN MY 562 SERVER AND HOW TO GET THE CAPE ANY TIPS!?

item.title: Can someone plz help how o i make donator?
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

[quote=“RaZoR36, post:4, topic:338061”]Well i can’t say the exact code and shit like that but you would need to declare the word “Donator” as a variable, then set the icon which will prolly need to be declared aswell. make the icon, Name it what you called it in the Code. then something like if(donator = 1);
show.donarIcon = true;
Or some shit like that xD to make the icon show, Then somewhere else you need to declare i think another variable to make the player be able to become a donator. Then walla, i believe your done xD.[/quote]

Rofl that’s like me saying:

To build a car first you need to get some pieces of metal. Then I think you need some tools too. Hit the metal with the tools a few times until it stats to look like a car. Then put the metal pieces together and walla! You’re done!

item.title: Can someone plz help how o i make donator?
item.dc:creator: @RaZoR36 RaZoR36
item.description:
@RaZoR36 wrote:

Well i can’t say the exact code and shit like that but you would need to declare the word “Donator” as a variable, then set the icon which will prolly need to be declared aswell. make the icon, Name it what you called it in the Code. then something like if(donator = 1);
show.donarIcon = true;
Or some shit like that xD to make the icon show, Then somewhere else you need to declare i think another variable to make the player be able to become a donator. Then walla, i believe your done xD.

Read full topic
